DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate long-term clinical effectiveness safety PINS Sacral Neuromodulation patient refractory Overactive Bladder .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Sacral Neuromodulation Treatment Refractory Overactive Bladder ( OAB )
DOC.criteria: Age great 16 year OAB and/or OAB symptom Refractory standard medical therapy 100ml bladder capacity normal upper urinary tract Good surgical candidate Able complete study documentation return followup evaluation Neurological condition Stress urinary incontinence OAB symptom cause urinary tract infection
